nodes.text: Orin-Va was a male Voss healer at the Shrine of Healing on Voss at the time of the Galactic War. He and his assistant Asha-Mu received the mystic-in-traing Gaden-Ko after he was poisoned by the Sith Lord Shendan, and at the Barsen'thor's consent, Orin-Va used Voss techniques to share the Jedi's life energy with the Voss.
